statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (8,-5) and (2,8).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

solution.p: \displaystyle\frac{{{8}-{\left(-{5}\right)}}}{{{2}-{\left({8}\right)}}}=\frac{{13}}{{-{{6}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{13}}{{6}} (if it's not already reduced)
